metadata.title: CVE-2022-21127 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Incomplete cleanup in specific special register read operations for someIntel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-21127` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20220510.0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20220510.0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
